name: Tectr
description:
Tectr -- The Dating App for Real Estates!

**18+**

Tectr is a game about thirsty architecture, buildings that want you inside them. Find your matches, see if you're compatible, and hook up with some feisty real estate.

Tectr was made for Global Game Jam 2016. It is strictly adults only and NSFW.

Tectr was made by Claris Cyarron, Lucas J.W. Johnson, Ken Glass, and Megan Furesz.
